rule.name: CASE_APP_getOrderDetailsData
rule.description: Queries the OrderDetails view and provides options for selection or aggregation. [customerId]: If provided, will only return results for that customer. [columnNames]: If specified, it will return only the selected columns. Acceptable column options are: customerId, orderId, orderTaxRate, orderShippingCost, orderTotal, orderItemid, orderItemQty, orderItemUnitPrice, prodTotal, productId, productName, productManufacturer, productStock. [groupByColumns]: When provided, this indicates which columns will be grouped by. The aggregationColumns and aggregationFunction cannot be null or the function will return null. [aggregationColumns]: Indicates which columns to aggregate by. [aggregationFunction]: The function to use when aggregating the field. Valid values: “COUNT”, “SUM”, “AVG”, “MIN”, “MAX”.
